mapper.select:
select ep.id, ep.expert_code, ep.product_name, ep.research, ep.technology, ep.content, ep.images, ep.create_date, ei.name as expertName, ei.images AS avatar from expert_product ep left join expert_info ei on (ei.code = ep.expert_code) where 1 = 1
AND ei.name LIKE CONCAT('%',#{expertProduct.expertName},'%')
AND ep.product_name LIKE CONCAT('%',#{expertProduct.productName},'%')
order by ep.create_date desc
